title: Trivago CEO Optimistic on Summer Return for Travel
itunes:title: Trivago CEO Optimistic on Summer Return for Travel
description:
Trivago CEO Axel Hefer discusses his optimistic outlook for a return to travel over the summer.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
